page.title: 01A general review of the area
page.content: The area we looked at is mainly farmland -much of it is used as managed grassland.The River Churnet flows through the bottom left hand section of our area,cutting quite a deep valley with tree-covered sides. About a quarter of our area is owned by a local factory owner.His wife lives at Wootton Lodge and their grounds spread over into three of the kilometre squares-with lakes and woods and parklands.The main village in the area is Ellastone-with a population of about 250.This village lies in the valley of the River Dove.Ellastone is a village that spreads-It is not a compact village. There is very little industry in the area-only a small engineering factory and a stone mason.Recently younger people have moved out and older people are moving into the village.T
